name: (RC9GN Game 1) - Press Space to Not Touch!
name_original: (RC9GN Game 1) - Press Space to Not Touch!
description:
Press Space to Not Touch!

Title Screen by : ITSYAMTASTIC ♥

"An educational game about personal space. But what happens if you don't press space???"

A small game I made one afterschool day in 2014. ♥ ((Randy touches Howard so much like??)) I wanted to prove to myself that its possible to make things even when it seems there isn't much time u,vu. Good lesson

Enjoy ppp
